attributes.action: Prevention, awareness, funding & end of stigma in relation to HIV/AIDS & STI's
attributes.additional_details: To look into the rise of diagnosed people in the UK living with HIV and other STI's, the lack of funding for clinics especially in rural and non-metropolitian areas.  Also that the Government should launch a strong campaign not only of the need for prevention but the need to break down the stigma & discrimation people with HIV face.
